addons.description: themoviedb.org is a free and open movie database. It's completely user driven by people like you. TMDb is currently used by millions of people every month and with their powerful API, it is also used by many popular media centers like Kodi to retrieve Movie Metadata, Posters and Fanart to enrich the user's experience.
addons.name: metadata.tvshows.themoviedb.org

addons.description: TheTVDB.com is a TV Scraper. The site is a massive open database that can be modified by anybody and contains full meta data for many shows in different languages. All content and images on the site have been contributed by their users for users and have a high standard or quality. The database schema and website are open source under the GPL.
addons.name: metadata.tvdb.com
addons.summary: Fetch TV show metadata from TheTVDB.com

addons.description: TheTVDB.com is a TV Scraper. The site is a massive open database that can be modified by anybody and contains full meta data for many shows in different languages. All content and images on the site have been contributed by their users for users and have a high standard or quality. The database schema and website are open source under the GPL.
addons.name: metadata.tvdb.com.python
addons.summary: Fetch TV show metadata from TheTVDB.com

addons.description:
TVmaze is a free user driven TV database curated by TV lovers all over the world. You can track your favorite shows from anywhere.
We provide an API that can be used by anyone or service like Kodi to retrieve TV Metadata, show/episode/cast images, and much more.
addons.name: metadata.tvmaze
addons.news:
1.0.5:
- Fixed a rare crash on some Python 3.x versions.

1.0.4:
- Fixed a crash with non-ASCII show title in Python 2
addons.summary: Fetch TV Show metadata from TVmaze.com
